name: Wall Breaker (Solanum Team)
description:
Welcome to Wall Breaker!

Help C-Boy break into some firewalls!

This game was made in 3 days for the Wowie Jam 4.0, with the theme "Collaborate with AI".

Controls: Arrow Keys / Enter (To start and restart the game) / R (Reset highscore) / Hover mouse over the medal to see info about it

Art / Programming / Sound&Music by Randoraz
